dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.whatsappDescription: By default, MenuChat uses our WhatsApp number. You can configure your custom number by entering the required information.
dashboard.usingCustomNumber: You are using a custom WhatsApp number. You can return to MenuChat's default number:

campaigns.title: Campaigns
campaigns.willBeSent: Your campaign will be sent to {{count}} contacts {{time}}
campaigns.loadingDescription: We're retrieving your campaigns from the database.
campaigns.noCampaignsDescription: Try modifying the filters to see more results.
campaigns.createFirstCampaign: Create your first campaign to get started!
campaigns.tipDescription: Campaigns sent between 5:00 PM and 7:00 PM have a 25% higher open rate. Try scheduling your next campaign during this time!

campaignCreate.title: Create Campaign
campaignCreate.campaignDetailsPlaceholder: Describe what you want to achieve with this campaign and any specific details to include...
campaignCreate.sendNowDescription: The campaign will be sent in approximately 10 minutes
campaignCreate.scheduleLaterDescription: Choose specific date and time for sending
campaignCreate.scheduleNote: Schedule time must be at least 10 minutes from now

typeDescriptions.update: Announce new items or menu changes

errors.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one contact to continue
errors.selectCampaignType: Please select a campaign type to continue
errors.enterCampaignDetails: Please enter campaign details and objective to continue
errors.generateOrEnterMessage: Please generate or enter message text
errors.scheduleAtLeast10Minutes: Schedule time must be at least 10 minutes from now

campaignCreate.readyForCampaign: Ready to be included in your campaign
campaignCreate.howToGenerate: How would you like to generate your image?
campaignCreate.autoGenerateDescription: We'll create an image based on your campaign type and message using AI
campaignCreate.customPromptDescription: Describe the image you want to generate with AI
campaignCreate.customPromptPlaceholder: E.g., A delicious pizza with melted cheese and fresh toppings on a wooden table with soft restaurant lighting
campaignCreate.customPromptTip: Be specific and detailed for better results. Avoid text in the image and use high-quality descriptors.
campaignCreate.chooseMediaMethod: Choose how to add media to your campaign:
campaignCreate.generatingBasedOnCampaign: Generating image based on your campaign...
campaignCreate.generatingBasedOnDescription: Generating image based on your description...
campaignCreate.couldntGenerateCustom: We couldn't generate a custom image, so we're using a default one.
campaignCreate.secondaryCtaDescription: This unsubscribe option is automatically added to comply with messaging regulations and cannot be modified.
campaignCreate.aiCraftingMessage: Our AI is crafting a personalized message based on your campaign details. This may take a few moments.
campaignCreate.campaignWillBeSent: Your campaign will be sent to {{count}} contacts {{when}}

campaignDetails.title: Campaign Details
campaignDetails.campaignNotFoundDescription: The campaign you're looking for doesn't exist or you don't have permission to view it.

restaurantBasics.title: Let's get to know your restaurant!

menuSetup.title: Let's configure your menu in different languages!
menuSetup.languagesDescription: Your customers will automatically receive the menu in their language based on their phone number prefix.

reviewLink.title: Set up your review link!
reviewLink.whereReviews: Where do you want customers to leave reviews?
reviewLink.googleDescription: We'll use this link when customers want to leave a review.

welcomeMessage.title: Welcome Message
welcomeMessage.generating: Generating personalized welcome message with Claude 3.7 Sonnet...
welcomeMessage.autoTranslate: This message will be automatically translated into all customer languages.

reviewRequest.title: Set up review requests!
reviewRequest.generating: Generating your personalized review message with Claude 3.7 Sonnet...
reviewRequest.reviewLinkAdded: The review link will be automatically added as a button below your message.
reviewRequest.whenAskReview: When should we ask for a review?
reviewRequest.timingDescription: Based on our research, 2 hours after an order is the perfect time to request a review. Your customers have finished their meal and are likely to leave positive feedback.
reviewRequest.timingNote: Note: For customer convenience, review requests will never be sent after midnight or before 8 AM, regardless of your timing settings.

triggerWord.title: Set your trigger phrase!
triggerWord.triggerDescription: This can be a greeting + your restaurant name (e.g. "Hello Pizzeria Italia") or any unique phrase. When customers scan your table QR code, WhatsApp will open with your trigger phrase pre-filled.
triggerWord.alreadyUsed: This trigger phrase is already in use. Please choose another one.
triggerWord.errorChecking: Error checking availability. Please try again.
triggerWord.tooShort: Trigger phrase must be at least 3 characters long
triggerWord.tooLong: Keep your trigger phrase short and memorable (under 30 characters recommended).
triggerWord.important: Important: Your trigger phrase must be unique across our system. This phrase is what connects customers to your specific restaurant when they scan your QR code, as our WhatsApp number serves many restaurants worldwide.

signUp.title: Create your account!
signUp.almostDescription: Just one more step to go! Create your account now and in the next step, you'll be able to start using your WhatsApp Menu Bot service right away. All your configuration will be saved with your account.
signUp.termsAgreement: By creating an account, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

success.title: Well Done! 🎉
success.subtitle: Your WhatsApp Menu Bot is ready to go!
success.scanQR: Scan this QR code with your phone
success.qrNote: Note: This QR code is configured to use our default WhatsApp number (+39 351 654 1218). In the app, you can request to activate your own business phone number for a more personalized experience.
success.unlockFeatures: Keep going to unlock more features

validation.allFieldsRequired: All fields are required to proceed to the next step.
